name: Flying Firefighter Truck simulator 2016 Real City Hero
name_original: Flying Firefighter Truck simulator 2016 Real City Hero
description:
Flying Firefighter Truck simulator 2016 Real City Hero

Flying Firefighter 3D is an awesome new 3D Flying Flight Simulation game.
Have you ever had the dream to become a Fireman? Now you can! Play Firefighter Simulator 3D and save citizens from dangerous fires! Time travel to the future, be the extreme pilot of the flying car.
If you are a fanatic fan of flying bus, dragons and muscle carriage driving games then download this free flying lorry game today.
Speed up by switching on the turbo engines. Avoid crashing into the skyscapers of the city buildings.
In the finest combination of airborne motor racing games and carriage stunt games, run on the runway and fly your motorcar around the city to perform multiple stunts and drifts.

This game is only for Fun.....

Enjoy a realistic flying lorry simulator and be the best motorcar stunt race driver.
This game looks pretty funny and interesting, because where else can you see the flying machine on the old engine of the future.
There are no missions are available in this game. you fell free to play this game.
Thanks to modern games that look cool even on mobile phones, now we can better understand how it would look in real life
Realistic graphics will help even more to experience flight in a flying Truck.
This game is for all ages who like to do advantures. infect your kids also love this game.

Time travel to the future, be the extreme pilot of the flying lorry.
If you are a fanatic fan of flying bus, dragons and muscle carriage driving games then download this free flying Firefighter Truck 2016 today.

GAME FEATURES:

=> Test your Pickup Truck Driving Skills
=> Improve Airplane Flight Ability
=> Stunning HD Graphics
=> Easy and Free to use
=> No WiFi? No Problem.
=> Offline Play
